SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Model.ClientModel

Class ClientGame

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Model.Room
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Model.ClientModel.ClientGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ClientGame extends Room implements Serializable
Represents a client-side game that extends the Room. This class handles the state of the game from the client's perspective.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientGame

      public ClientGame(UUID uuid, List<Player> players, ClientPlayer myself, ArrayList<ClientCard> ownHand, ClientCard[] placedResourceCards, ClientCard[] placedGoldCards, ClientCard[] commonObjectives, ClientCard topDeckResourceCard, ClientCard topDeckGoldCard, ClientCard ownObjective, int currentRound, int currentPlayerIndex, int turnsLeftUntilGameEnds)
      Constructs a new ClientGame with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      players - the list of players in the game
      myself - the player object representing the current client
      ownHand - the cards in the player's hand
      placedResourceCards - the resource cards placed on the table
      placedGoldCards - the gold cards placed on the table
      commonObjectives - the common objective cards placed on the table
      topDeckResourceCard - the top resource card of the deck
      topDeckGoldCard - the top gold card of the deck
      ownObjective - the secret objective card chosen by the player
      currentRound - the current round of the game
      currentPlayerIndex - the index of the player currently playing
      turnsLeftUntilGameEnds - the number of turns after which the game will end
